get.summary: Get a list of Workstreams or poll for updated Workstreams.
get.description:
This operation will get a list of all Workstreams or Workstreams filtered by certain criteria.
It can also be used to poll for updated Workstreams.
            
#### Filtering and Sorting ####

The results for this operation can be filtered by name or by state (i.e. Running, Failed, etc.).
When filtering by name, partial matches are used. The match can be found anywhere within the name property.
An 'orderBy' can be specified to sort the responses by different fields (i.e. name, state).
            
#### Polling ####

This operation also supports a polling token. If a call is made without a polling token, then all Workstreams are
returned based any specified filtering. The response includes a 'pollingToken' field. If that polling token is passed
in on a subsequent request using query parameters, then only updated Workstreams updated since the previous call
 are returned. If no Workstreams have been modified, then an empty list is returned. A new polling token is returned with
each request and is passed to the next request while continuing to poll for changes.
            
#### Paging ####

If there are too many items to return in one response, a single page of data is
returned along with an opaque continuation token. This token is sent with the next request
in order to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: Citrix-CustomerId
parameters.description: The customer's Citrix Cloud ID. This value is sent as a request header.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page. If a value is not specified, the page size defaults to 100 items.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: If a value is specified, only return Workstreams in the specified state. Valid values are 'Pending', 'Running', 'CancelRequested', 'Cancelling', 'Cancelled', 'Succeded', or 'Failed'.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If a value is specified, then only Workstreams with this value in the name are returned. The value exists anywhere in the name.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: If a value is specified[JP1], the results are sorted using the specified field. If not specified, results are sorted by the order they were created. Valid values are 'State ASC' and 'State DESC'.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: An opaque continuation token returned from a previous call. If this field/value/parameter is not specified, the first page is returned.

parameters.name: pollingToken
parameters.description: If this field/value/parameter specified[JP2], only Workstreams updated since the polling token was generated are returned. The polling token is taken from the response of a previous call.

400.description: An invalid value was passed for one of the query parameters. This could be an invalid 'orderBy' field, invalid 'pollingToken', or an invalid 'state'.

post.description:
This operation initiates the execution of a Workstream using the playbook specified in the body of the request. The 'inputs' field in the body contains the input fields specific to the actual playbook being executed. See below for the input field requirements for each playbook. #### Additional Information #### Click [here](https://stage-docs.citrix.com/en-us/citrix-cloud/workspaces/workstreams#configure-a-workstream) for more information on the playbooks and Workstreams. #### Playbooks ####

The following playbooks can be executed.

--- #### **Publish Citrix App Layering Image Template Playbook** #### **Playbook Id: cal-publish[JP3]**
Use the Citrix App Layering appliance to publish an image from the specified image template.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields should be added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |imageTemplate|string|True|The name of the image template to publish.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |imageVhd|string|The path identifier for the resulting VHD image.|
--- #### **cal-create-platform-layer** #### **Playbook Id: cal-create-platform-layer**
Create an App Layering platform layer
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields should be added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |brokerPlatformType|string|False|The type of the broker platform.| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |osLayerName|string|True|The name of the OS layer to associate with the platform layer.| |reason|string|False|A reason for creating the platform layer.| |hypervisorPlatform|string|False|The name of the hypervisior platform.| |layerRevisionSize|integer|True|The size to allocate for the initial platform layer in MBs.| |layerDescription|string|False|A description of the platform layer.| |connectorConfigName|string|False|The name of the connector configuration.| |provisioningPlatform|string|False|The name of the provisioning platform.| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name of the initial platform layer version.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the platform layer.| |layerRevisionDescription|string|False|A description of the initial platform layer version.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |status|string|The status of the created platform layer.| |packagingMachineName|string|The name of packaging virtual machine used to create the layer.|
--- #### **cal-create-platform-layer-revision** #### **Playbook ID: cal-create-platform-layer-revision**
Create a version of an App Layering platform layer.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields should be added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |brokerPlatformType|string|False|The type of broker platform.| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |hypervisorPlatform|string|False|The name of the hypervisior platform.| |reason|string|False|A reason for creating the platform layer.| |provisioningPlatform|string|False|The name of the provisioning platform.| |connectorConfigName|string|False|The name of the connector configuration.| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name of the platform layer version.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the platform layer.| |layerRevisionDescription|string|False|A description of the platform layer version.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |status|string|The status of the created platform layer version.| |packagingMachineName|string|The name of the packaging virtual machine that will be used to create the layer.|
--- #### **cal-create-app-layer** #### **Playbook ID: cal-create-app-layer**
Create an app layer.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields should be added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |osLayerRevisionName|string|False|The name of the OS layer version to associate with the app layer.| |osLayerName|string|True|The name of the OS layer to associate with the app layer.| |reason|string|False|A reason for creating the app layer.| |requiredLayers|[(string, string)]|False|List of all prerequisite layers.| |layerRevisionSize|integer|True|The size to allocate for the app layer in MBs.| |layerDescription|string|False|A description of the app layer.| |connectorConfigName|string|False|The name of the connector configuration.| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name for the initial app layer version.| |layerName|string|True|The name for the app layer.| |layerRevisionDescription|string|False|A description of the initial app layer version.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |status|string|The status of the created app layer.| |packagingMachineName|string|The name of packaging virtual machine that will be used to create the layer.|
--- #### **cal-cancel-platform-layer** #### **Playbook ID: cal-cancel-platform-layer**
Cancel the creation of a platform layer or platform layer version.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields are added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name of the platform layer version.| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the platform layer.|
--- #### **cal-delete-app-layer-revision** #### **Playbook ID: cal-delete-app-layer-revision**
Delete a version of an app layer
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields are added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name of the app Layer version to delete.| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the app layer.| |reason|string|False|A reason for deleting the app layer version.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |status|string|The status of the deletion operation.|
--- #### **cal-create-app-layer-revision** #### **Playbook ID: cal-create-app-layer-revision**
Create a new version of an app layer.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields are added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |baseLayerRevision|string|False|The name of the app layer version the new app layer version based on.| |reason|string|False|A reason for creating the app layer version.| |requiredLayers|[string]|False|List of all prerequisite layers.| |layerRevisionSize|integer|False|The size to allocate for the app layer in MBs.| |connectorConfigName|string|False|The name of the connector configuration.| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name for the new app layer version.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the app layer.| |layerRevisionDescription|string|False|A description of the new app layer version.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |status|string|The status of the created app layer version.| |packagingMachineName|string|The name of the packaging virtual machine used to create the layer.|
--- #### **cal-finalize-layer** #### **Playbook Id: cal-finalize-layer**
Finalize an App Layering layer.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields are added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name of the layer version.| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the finalized layer.| |layerType|string|True|The type of finalized layer.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are displayed in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |status|string|The status of the finalize operation.|
--- #### **cal-cancel-app-layer** #### **Playbook ID: cal-cancel-app-layer**
Cancel the creation of an app layer or app layer version.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name of the app layer version.| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the app layer.|
--- #### **cal-create-os-layer-revision** #### **Playbook ID: cal-create-os-layer-revision**
Create a version of an App Layering OS layer.
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |baseLayerRevision|string|False|The name of the OS layer version for which the new OS layer version is based upon.| |reason|string|False|A reason for deleting the OS layer version.| |layerRevisionSize|integer|False|The size to allocate for the OS layer in MBs.| |connectorConfigName|string|False|The name of the connector configuration.| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name for the new OS layer version.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the OS layer.| |layerRevisionDescription|string|False|A description of the new OS layer version.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results[JP4]' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.
| Name | Type | Description | |------|------|-------------| |status|string|The status of the OS layer version creation operation.| |packagingMachineName|string|The name of the packaging virtual machine used to create the layer.|
--- #### **cal-delete-os-layer-revision** #### **Playbook ID: cal-delete-os-layer-revision**
Delete a version of an App Layering OS layer
**Playbook Inputs**
The fields are added to the 'inputs' field when posting a Workstream.
| Name | Type | Required | Description | |------|------|----------|-------------| |layerRevisionName|string|True|The name of the OS layer version to delete.| |calResourceID|string|True|The resource ID of the Citrix App Layering appliance.| |layerName|string|True|The name of the OS layer.| |reason|string|False|A reason for deleting the OS layer version.|
**Playbook Results**
Upon successful completion of a Workstream, these fields are set in the 'results' field returned from the GET Workstream routes.

--- #### **cal-cancel-os-layer** #### **Playbook Id: cal-cancel-os-layer**

name.description: The display name for the Workstream

name.description: The display name for the Workstream

state.description: State of the Workstream (e.g. Running, Succeeded, Cancelled, etc.).

playbookId.description: Unique identifier of the Playbook being executed.

steps.description: The list of steps for the Workstream and the operations executed during each step, including the  status for the steps and operations.

results.description: The results returned from the completed execution of the playbook. The contents of this field varies depending on the playbook.

activeOperations.description: The number of operations that are actively executed.

state.description: State of the step (e.g. Running, Succeeded, Cancelled, etc[JP8].).

lastModified.description: Last time the step status was updated.

state.description: State of the operation (e.g. Running, Succeeded, Cancelled, etc.).

statusMessage.description: Any status messages returned from the component that executed the operation.

lastModified.description: When the operation completed or was terminated.

pageSize.description: The number of items returned in this page.

items.description: The array of items returned in this page.

continuationToken.description:
An opaque continuation token passed to the next query
in order to retrieve the next page of items. If null, this is the last page.

pollingToken.description:
An opaque token used on the next call to retrieve only those items modified since this call was made.
This might not be supported by all controllers.
